Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

I tried to keep this ship as stock as possible + Kethane Pack.

She has a Mass of 216,46 tons and 252parts in 3 Sections (Thrust [front], Fuel and Harvesting[rear]) and I powered it with 12 Nuclear Engines, 8 in the front and 4 + 1 Skipper in the Harvester.

It looks like a pretty solid built without almost any wobling but I am starting to think that it is way too heavy and could do better.

BTW. I think the Delta-V Windows is wrong or miscalculating.

Please add your Suggestions.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
You should check if the nuclear engines at the front do not damage anything - if they do damage something, it will mean that their exhaust is blocked - and they will lose all thrust in this case.

Hi Flyer,

I checked the Flight Report but they are distant enough from the Aft-Section.

It concerned me too by Assembling it in Space
